admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left”]

How We Got Started

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” animation_direction=”left”]

Doug Roth founded Playground Hospitality to share his knowledge with others who are driven to succeed in the notoriously challenging restaurant industry.

Doug is a third generation restaurateur with hospitality in his DNA, passed down from his father and grandfather.

Playground Hospitality leverages his 30 years of restaurant development and operations success and combines it with a network of leaders in all aspects of the restaurant and hospitality industry. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Farmers Section” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”30px||100px|||”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ admin_label=”Our Farmers Title Area” _builder_version=”3.25″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left”]

Our Partners

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” animation_direction=”left”]

We pair top talent to your project through our extensive global network of leaders in the hospitality industry. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”Our Farmers Area” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ max_width=”1200px”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/world-renowned-chefs-plating-food-presentation-playground-hospitality-935×1400.jpg” min_height=”60vh” height=”60vh” hover_enabled=”0″ title_text=”Male chef garnishing food”][/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”Renowned Chefs” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ header_font=”Lato||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation=”off”]

Playground thoughtfully pairs culinary talent to its projects, developing chef-driven concepts and updating taste profiles with rising innovators. 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/girl-4836396-683×1024.jpg” min_height=”60vh” height=”60vh”][/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”Cutting-Edge Creatives” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ header_font=”Lato||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation=”off” locked=”off”]

Playground’s design and creative partners operate at the intersection of strategy, design and execution to bring concepts to life. 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/tyler-nix-ZGa9d1a_4tA-unsplash-791×1024.jpg” min_height=”60vh” height=”60vh”][/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb title=”Market Makers” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ header_font=”Lato||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” header_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation=”off” locked=”off”]

Trend spotters, financial gurus and real estate savants create a strong business foundation to maximize profits and opportunities for expansion. 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Mission Section” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ custom_padding=”100px||100px|”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ admin_label=”Our Mission Area” _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left”]

Our Qualifications

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” animation_direction=”left”]

Doug owned and operated highly profitable restaurants, including Bistro 110, Bistro 100, Blackhawk Lodge, Don Roth Restaurants and the award-winning Red Moon. As an equity partner and vice president of development with Levy Restaurants, he created multiple nationally recognized restaurant concepts.

Doug and his team have seen dramatic shifts before and can advise you when to make a fast pivot. Playground Hospitality is guest obsessed and will help you ‘wow’ yours. More important, they see the subtle clues that keep your concept from connecting with customers.

As an industry veteran who’s launched dozens of successful concepts and experienced some misses, Doug keeps his clients from repeating expensive mistakes. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” admin_label=”Call to Action” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”6%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_module=”420″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Let’s Play!” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.75)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on”
